abstract: Why is Carl Icahn investing nearly $1 billion in energy companies? Speculation is rife, given his history of focusing on companies that he believes may be in need of a shakeup.
snippet: Why is Carl Icahn investing nearly $1 billion in energy companies? Speculation is rife, given his history of focusing on companies that he believes may be in need of a shakeup.
lead_paragraph: What is Carl C. Icahn up to in energy?

headline.main: What Icahn May Want in Energy
